recipeDescription: Koshari is an Egyptian dish that is widely known in Arab countries. The iconic dish is a harmonious blend of ingredients weaving together a rich culinary heritage of Egypt.
recipeIngredients:
115g lentils
300g Rice
Macaroni Pasta
2 Onions
80g Flour
4 Garlic cloves
1½ tsp Ground Coriander
1 can of 800g Tomato Sauce
2 tablespoon White Vinegar
½ tsp each of salt and pepper
½ - 1 tablespoon red pepper flakes (optional)
